name: Priotix
description:
Priotix is a global technology consultancy that designs, develops and supports unique software solutions, helping clients take their businesses forward. Recognized for their deep domain expertise and superior technical talent, we create enterprise web applications, solutions based on blockchain, IoT solutions, big data processing solutions and mobile apps.
Delivering world class quality software, based on most demanded and cutting-edge technologies, is what we enjoy the most at Priotix (previously known as Sourcio). 
 
In Numbers
12+ years of experience in IT business
55+ projects for global clients with 3+ years dedication
10+ countries covered (Germany, Austria, USA, UAE, Lebanon, England, France, Armenia, Russia, Israel)
7+ industries covered 
< 6% Employee turnover rate.
